text: David McAlister Barry (born July 3, 1947) is an American author and columnist. He wrote a nationally syndicated humor column for the Miami Herald from 1983 to 2005. He has also written many books of humor and parody. He won the Pulitzer Prize for Commentary (1988) and the Walter Cronkite Award for Excellence in Journalism (2005). Barry was born in Armonk, New York.
